tachyon.client.keyvalue

Interface KeyValueStores

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseKeyValueStores

    @PublicApi
public interface KeyValueStores
    Client to access or create key-value stores in Tachyon.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  KeyValueStores.Factory
      Factory for the KeyValueStores.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyValueStoreWriter create(TachyonURI uri)
      Gets a writer to create a new key-value store.
      void delete(TachyonURI uri)
      Deletes a completed key-value store.
      void merge(TachyonURI fromUri, TachyonURI toUri)
      Merges one completed key-value store to another completed key-value store.
      KeyValueStoreReader open(TachyonURI uri)
      Gets a reader to access a key-value store.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        KeyValueStoreReader open(TachyonURI uri)
                  throws IOException,
                         TachyonException
        Gets a reader to access a key-value store.
        Parameters:
        uri - TachyonURI to the store
        Returns:
        BaseKeyValueStoreReader instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if non-Tachyon error occurs
        TachyonException - if Tachyon error occurs

      • create

        KeyValueStoreWriter create(TachyonURI uri)
                    throws IOException,
                           TachyonException
        Gets a writer to create a new key-value store.
        Parameters:
        uri - TachyonURI to the store
        Returns:
        BaseKeyValueStoreWriter instance
        Throws:
        IOException - if non-Tachyon error occurs
        TachyonException - if Tachyon error occurs

      • delete

        void delete(TachyonURI uri)
     throws IOException,
            InvalidPathException,
            FileDoesNotExistException,
            TachyonException
        Deletes a completed key-value store.
        Parameters:
        uri - TachyonURI to the store
        Throws:
        IOException - if non-Tachyon error occurs
        InvalidPathException - if the uri exists but is not a key-value store
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the uri does not exist
        TachyonException - if other Tachyon error occurs

      • merge

        void merge(TachyonURI fromUri,
           TachyonURI toUri)
    throws IOException,
           TachyonException
        Merges one completed key-value store to another completed key-value store. If there are the same keys from both stores, they are merged too, for these keys, whose value will be retrieved is undetermined.
        Parameters:
        fromUri - the TachyonURI to the store to be merged
        toUri - the TachyonURI to the store to be merged to
        Throws:
        IOException - if non-Tachyon error occurs
        TachyonException - if other Tachyon error occurs
